name: O3-acetyl-L-serine:thiosulfate 2-amino-2-carboxyethyltransferase (reducing, L-cysteine-forming); O3-acetyl-L-serine acetate-lyase (thiosulfate-reducing, L-cysteine-forming)
definition: O-Acetyl-L-serine + Thiosulfate + Thioredoxin + H+ <=> L-Cysteine + Sulfite + Thioredoxin disulfide + Acetate

orthologs.K10150: cysteine synthase / O-phosphoserine sulfhydrylase / cystathionine beta-synthase [EC:2.5.1.47 2.5.1.65 4.2.1.22]
